databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_KENSEN.MS_KENSEN_ID, MS_KENSEN.MS_KENSEN_NAME, MS_KENSEN.KANKAKU, MS_KENSEN.DELETE_FLAG, MS_KENSEN.SEND_FLAG, MS_KENSEN.VESSEL_ID, MS_KENSEN.DATA_NO, MS_KENSEN.USER_KEY, MS_KENSEN.RENEW_DATE, MS_KENSEN.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_KENSEN.TS FROM MS_KENSEN where MS_KENSEN.DELETE_FLAG = 0

SELECT MS_KENSEN.MS_KENSEN_ID, MS_KENSEN.MS_KENSEN_NAME, MS_KENSEN.KANKAKU, MS_KENSEN.DELETE_FLAG, MS_KENSEN.SEND_FLAG, MS_KENSEN.VESSEL_ID, MS_KENSEN.DATA_NO, MS_KENSEN.USER_KEY, MS_KENSEN.RENEW_DATE, MS_KENSEN.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_KENSEN.TS FROM MS_KENSEN WHERE MS_KENSEN.MS_KENSEN_ID = :MS_KENSEN_ID

INSERT INTO MS_KENSEN( MS_KENSEN_ID, MS_KENSEN_NAME, KANKAKU, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :MS_KENSEN_ID, :MS_KENSEN_NAME, :KANKAKU, :DELETE_FLAG, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_KENSEN SET MS_KENSEN_NAME = :MS_KENSEN_NAME, KANKAKU = :KANKAKU, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (MS_KENSEN_ID = :MS_KENSEN_ID) AND (TS = :TS)

SELECT MS_KENSEN.MS_KENSEN_ID, MS_KENSEN.MS_KENSEN_NAME, MS_KENSEN.KANKAKU, MS_KENSEN.DELETE_FLAG, MS_KENSEN.SEND_FLAG, MS_KENSEN.VESSEL_ID, MS_KENSEN.DATA_NO, MS_KENSEN.USER_KEY, MS_KENSEN.RENEW_DATE, MS_KENSEN.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_KENSEN.TS FROM MS_KENSEN INNER JOIN KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK ON MS_KENSEN.MS_KENSEN_ID = KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.MS_KENSEN_ID WHERE KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.KS_SHOUSHO_ID = :KS_SHOUSHO_ID
